name: Unbridled Horror
description:
Unbridled Horror —

first-person dark psychological horror.

This story tells us about the teenage-girl, who once has awaken in a strange place. She doesn't remember, what's happened to her and she doesn't know, where she is. Will you help her to remember everything? Overcome the fears? Find the way home? Or you will live her alone in such ominous place forever?

-Game world

Events take place in a house full of mysteries, fears and unexplained things. Whether the main character will pass this terrible and dangerous way or not – depends on you.

Everything that occurs in our life - first of all occurs in our head!

-Features

• Somber atmosphere
• Dynamic interaction
• Various puzzles
• Powered by Unreal Technology

-Items

Apple - Restore 50% HP. There is a possibility to find the rotten one.

House key - With this key you can open certain doors.

Bottle of water - Restore 15% HP. Restore 50% stamina.

Medium first aid kit - Restore 50% HP. Detoxification.

Large first aid kit - Restore 100% HP. Detoxification.

Small first aid kit - Restore 25% HP.

Father`s ring - The ring will help you get out of hell.

Pink key - Opens the door with a pink label.

Red key - Opens the door with a red label.

Yellow key - Opens the door with a yellow label.

Green key - Opens the door with a green label.

Blue key - Opens the door with a blue label.

-Input

[WASD] - Control the Player
[E/RMB] - Interact with Object
[F] - Flashlight
[I] - Inventory
[O] - Diary
[R] - Grab
[V] - Close Eyes

-System Requirements[PC]

Minimum:
OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 Bits)
Processor: 2.0+ GHz
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS | AMD Radeon 3850
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Storage: 1 GB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360

Recommended:
OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64 Bits)
Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 | AMD Radeon HD 6950
DirectX: Version 9.0c | 11
Storage: 1 GB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360

-System Requirements[Mac]

Minimum:
Processor: 2.3 Ghz Intel
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Video: 512 MB Nvidia or ATI graphics card
Storage: 1 GB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360

Recommended:
Processor: 2.3 Ghz Intel
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Video: 512 MB Nvidia or ATI graphics card
Storage: 1 GB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360
